aka: Door That Is Open for You
trans_title: Door That Is Open for You
introduction: Life and relationship in some kolkhoz. Elma is the chairwoman and her views on future and development are not shared by chief agronomist Kaspars. Elma's husband, who left years ago not willing to make compromises when his vision of developments did not correspond with that of the higher authorities, unexpectedly returns; Kaspars has a son in his rebellious years who does not exactly like father's wife Guna and decides to start living on his own.
